application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 13 (Transport - Signage) in relation to Reserved Matters application reference 17/6662/RMA dated 28 February 2018 (as amended by 20/0362/NMA dated 7 February 2020, 20/1174/NMA dated 4 September 2020, 20/5694/NMA dated 1 April 2021, 21/5981/NMA dated 10 August 2022, 23/2212/NMA dated 4 August 2023, and 23/5028/NMA dated 19 January 2024) relating to the layout, appearance, access and landscaping in respect of Plot 12 falling within Phase 1B (South) sub-phase of the Section 73 outline planning permission for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme reference F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014.
